describe: Cabo Verde, also known as Cape Verde, is an island country located in the central Atlantic Ocean. It consists of 10 volcanic islands and is known for its Creole Portuguese-African culture, picturesque landscapes, and vibrant music scene.

cities.name: üèù Praia
cities.geographical_location: Located on the southern coast of Santiago Island.
cities.climate: Praia has a tropical dry climate with a short wet season and a long dry season.
cities.famous_cuisine: Cachupa, a traditional stew made with corn, beans, and fish or meat.

cities.name: üèù Mindelo
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the northern coast of S√£o Vicente Island.
cities.climate: Mindelo experiences a mild desert climate with minimal rainfall.
cities.famous_cuisine: Lagostada, a lobster dish often served with rice and vegetables.

cities.name: üèù Santa Maria
cities.geographical_location: Located on the southern tip of Sal Island.
cities.climate: Santa Maria has a desert climate with warm temperatures year-round.
cities.famous_cuisine: Grilled fish with cachupa rica, a richer version of the traditional stew.
